entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 0.21.0.knots20210130 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 0.21.0.knots20210130, which can be downloaded from their website. This update comes with new features, bug fixes and performance improvements, along with updated translations. Users are encouraged to report any bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub. Those who wish to receive security and update notifications are advised to subscribe to the announcements mailing list. For more detailed information, users can refer to the release notes and change log available on GitHub.
